deployment.question: How quickly can I get my server running?
deployment.answer: Most servers are deployed within 30 seconds of payment confirmation. You'll receive login details immediately.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
upgrade.answer: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades at the next billing cycle.

games.question: What games do you support?
games.answer: We support all major games including Minecraft, Rust, ARK, Counter-Strike, Team Fortress 2, and many more.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

hero.title: Minecraft servers that
hero.description: Launch Paper, Forge, Fabric, or Bedrock servers with automatic jar selection, modpack installs, and instant scaling.

features.title: One-click modpacks
features.description: Install CurseForge & Modrinth packs with dependency management and version locking.

features.title: Bedrock + Java parity
features.description: Enable cross-play with preconfigured Geyser & Floodgate pipelines.

features.title: Performance autoscaling
features.description: Burst CPU & RAM to absorb player spikes without restarting worlds.

benefits.title: Built for big communities
benefits.description: Give your builders, redstoners, and speedrunners a server that stays smooth even when the world file explodes.

items.title: Managed backups
items.description: Hourly snapshots with 7-day retention and 1-click restore.

items.title: Proactive monitoring
items.description: TPS, memory, and chunk health alerts routed to Discord.

items.title: Plugin safe updates
items.description: Stage updates in a clone before promoting to production.

cta.title: Spin up your next Minecraft world in under a minute
cta.description: Pick a region, paste your modpack, and start inviting players while we handle scaling, security, and backups.

faqs.question: Can I migrate an existing world?
faqs.answer: Yes. Upload your world folder or point us to an S3 bucket and we import it with zero downtime.

faqs.question: Do you support Bedrock clients?
faqs.answer: Geyser/Floodgate is pre-installed so Bedrock players can join without extra plugins.

hero.title: Low-latency Rust servers
hero.description: Deploy PvP, PvE, and modded Rust servers with automatic wipes, Oxide/uMod, and real-time performance metrics.

features.title: Automated wipe schedules
features.description: Pre-set weekly or custom cadence with Discord announcements.

features.title: Oxide & uMod ready
features.description: Upload plugins, manage configs, and roll back with version history.

features.title: Advanced DDoS filtering
features.description: Layer 3-7 mitigation tuned for Rust attack patterns.

benefits.title: Competitive players stay online
benefits.description: Keep clans engaged with predictable wipes, stable performance, and instant support.

items.title: Region balancing
items.description: Deploy across NA/EU/Asia with latency-aware routing.

items.title: Performance presets
items.description: Choose between vanilla, 2x, or custom gather rates with saved templates.

items.title: Crash recovery
items.description: Automatic restarts with last known good save plus alerting.

cta.title: Own every Rust wipe
cta.description: From blueprints to raid alerts, HostChicken automates the busywork so you can focus on the fight.

faqs.question: Can I schedule BP wipes separately?
faqs.answer: Yes‚Äîconfigure map and BP wipes independently with cron-style precision.

faqs.question: Do you support custom maps?
faqs.answer: Upload .map files or link to CDN storage; we validate and rotate them automatically.

hero.title: ARK: Survival Ascended hosting
hero.description: Spin up ASA or ASE clusters with mod workshop syncing, dino backups, and cross-server travel.

features.title: Cluster automation
features.description: Link multiple maps with shared player and dino data.

features.title: Mod workshop mirroring
features.description: Auto-download, update, and rollback Steam mods per server.

features.title: Safe taming mode
features.description: Scheduled resource boosts and offline raid protection templates.

benefits.title: Perfect for tribes & creators
benefits.description: From small friend groups to monetized clusters, you get predictable performance and white-glove assistance.

items.title: Blueprint versioning
items.description: Track every config change with instant rollback.

items.title: Dino insurance
items.description: Enable disaster recovery to resurrect creatures after crashes.

items.title: Creator monetization
items.description: Patreon and Tebex perks integrate out of the box.

cta.title: Launch your ARK cluster today
cta.description: Choose your maps, define rates, and we'll handle the autoscaling plus backups.

faqs.question: Can I mix ASA and ASE?
faqs.answer: Yes, deploy both editions inside one dashboard with separate resource pools.

faqs.question: How do mod updates work?
faqs.answer: We mirror Steam Workshop updates to a staging server before applying them to production.

features.title: Blueprint-safe autosaves

features.title: Performance overlays

features.title: SMM & FICSIT mods

benefits.title: Keep production running

items.title: Unlimited players

items.title: Custom automation scripts

cta.title: Ship your next milestone faster

faqs.question: Do you support experimental builds?
faqs.answer: Yes, opt into experimental or stable channels per server with 1-click rollback.

faqs.question: Can I upload local saves?
faqs.answer: Drag-and-drop saves in the panel or sync via S3/Dropbox.
